caption.p: Evaluation of predictor variables in the parsimonious model. Ranking of the variables according to their predictive importance in the model, as measured by the Ï‡ 2-d.f. (degrees of freedom) statistic (A). Odds ratios for all the variables, using interquartile-range odds ratios for continuous features, and simple odds ratios for categorical features (B). Generated with the anova.rms and summary functions in the rms and base packages in R.
